column4: This is a blog post from someone who used to be an MGTOW YouTuber.

We consider one of the channels in the list to be “not MGTOW enough”, which is Black Pidgeon Speaks, this channels talks mostly about “The West”, “The Great Replacement” and other white supremacist themes.
